content: I live in New York but can go to PA to help. I have New York in my State Engagement but I don't see how I can add Pennsylvania.

Hi Kel,  Great question. Easy fix. Click on Channels & Roles. Then in the Customize page, scroll down to the state section and add any state you like. When you begin typing the state list will pop up.
Hi Susan. Thank you. Done! I see PA now and the chats in there. I'll browse around to find out how to look for opportunities to help in PA.
